[status]               Your fake, silver hair has turned into a semi-flexible plate which surrounds your head in a single mass. It gives the appearance of a hairstyle, but wouldn't require nearly as much maintenance. Some how, your $MIND$ is aware that if you (or someone else) really wanted too, your hair could become more malleable, long enough to be set in a different style. It's also probably heavy and thick enough to function as a helmet.;
[short]               silvery robot hair;

[SHIRT];
[STAGE] 0;
[status]               You are wearing a sensible white, button-up shirt with long sleeves, suitable for work. You take painstaking care to obey the office's dress code.;
[short]               white office shirt with long sleeves;
[STAGE] 1;
[tf]               Something feels off about your shirt. You look at it, and realize it has gone from being a formal, work-style shirt, to a regular long-sleeved white shirt. It also might be a bit smaller, considering how tight it feels around your $BREASTS$. You glance over at your $CUSTOM2$, hoping she doesn't mind. ;
[status]               Your button-up work shirt has been transformed (somehow) into a plain white longsleeve shirt. It won't cut it at work, but it's not too bad, as far as shirts go. Maybe a little tight around your $BREASTS$...;
[short]               long-sleeved white shirt;
[STAGE] 2;
[tf]               You wince a little as your shirt suddenly feels a little tighter. You glance down and are embarrassed to discover it has become a tight, silver-white latex top, which clings to the curves of your upper $BODY$. You're clearly not wearing a bra anymore, given how the material of the top vividly outlines your nipples at the tips of your $BREASTS$. You fervently glance out into the audience, hoping your $CUSTOM2$ and $CUSTOM3$ haven't noticed. ;
[status]               Your shirt has turned into a tight, silvery white latex top, which fits snugly over your $BREASTS$, clearly outlining your nipples. It's a very sexual garment, and you hope nobody from work can see you in it.;
[short]               silvery white latex top;
[STAGE] 3;
[tf]               You feel cool air on your $ARMS$, as the sleeves of your top shrinks up past your elbows. As it snugly restructures itself, also pulling up away from your midriff a little, you think it now looks more like a tight, latex jacket. It's actually a very cool and flattering look. ;
[status]               You are wearing a tight, latex jacket which is silvery white in color. It only covers part of your $ARMS$, and also shows off your midriff. It still continues to hold very tight to your $BREASTS$, revealing their shape. It's getting a little uncomfortable, actually. Though, there is an odd zipper, you wonder what it is for?;
[short]               silvery white latex jacket;
[STAGE] 4;
[tf]               Something clicks in your $MIND$. You know what the zipper on your jacket is for. You undo it, removing a "window" of material from your chest, discarding it onto the floor, and baring your $BREASTS$ to the world. It's much more comfortable, and allows easier access to your $BODY$.;
[status]               You have removed a "window" cutout in your jacket, which completely reveals your $BREASTS$. Perfect for looking. Or touching. The material you unzipped lies on the floor next to you. If you so desired, you could replace it, returning you to "modesty".;
[short]               latex jacket with boob window;

[Alias]           1 Glasses;
